pages.text: Cults are a handy tool to loosely organize groups of players interested in the occult. Founding a cult will allow things like the collectivized use of $(l:manipulation/entry_nexus)Dimensional Nexuses$() and soulless Cultists.$(br2)Cults are manifested in $(item)Cult Badges$(), and a cult member will only be recognized as such if they happen to wear one (as bauble).

Once crafted, the badge must be bound to an owner. This is simply done by using the Badge for the first time. The list of cult members can be expanded by using the badges of both participants in the $(marked)Rite of the Pact$()
As the rite is performed, the two badges must be thrown near the Nexus, resulting in them adding each other's owner to the other's list of members by the end of the rite.
